text: @AnthemRespect @realDonaldTrump A moderate Democrat announcing Democrats are 'hard at work to keep US citizens" from obtaining Hydrox that 30+ countries are already using to fight against COVID19.  Interesting because the FDA approved this drug in 1965 (for other purposes to be transparent)
